messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I would like to exchange my Wireless Earbuds order #W6908222. I want to switch from the blue ones with 8 hours battery life and IPX4 water resistance to a pair that is black, has 4 hours battery life, and is not water resistant. Can you assist me with this exchange?
